inputs: Omicron is a variant in which 26-32 mutations in the spike, which is used to infect cells by the COVID-19 virus.
labels: Омикрон — это штамм, который содержит от 26 до 32 мутаций в пепломерах, которые вирус COVID-19 использует при заражении клеток.

inputs: The existing technology screens only specific areas of the virus, but the molecular diagnostic technology was designed to cause nucleic acid-binding reactions only when the COVID-19 RNA exists, enabling rapid detection.

predictions: A possible cause of the power outage in Gabba was a lightning strike on a transmission tower. The storm that hit the area caused a surge in demand for electricity, which overloaded the power grid. The power outage lasted for several hours, and the stadium was left without power. The stadium's backup generators were unable to handle the demand, and the stadium was left in darkness. The power outage could happen again if there is another storm or if the power grid is overloaded.
